About

My name is Alban Lorillard, I'm 23 years old and I'm an IT engineering student at Polytech Nantes, the graduate engineering school of University of Nantes.

Computer enthusiast since I was 12, I started coding my first websites by learning myself web languages like HTML, CSS, PHP. Today, I focus on fullstack JS website using NodeJS, AngularJS and other frameworks.

I describe myself calm and persistant about technologies. I enjoy being driven by goals and working in a team.

Thanks to my scientist and computing education, I face computer challenges from the algorithmic point of view.

Learn more about my skills.

Tools & Project management

Web Development
Sun Radio Datavizualisation (Hyblab)
Sun Radio listeners can choose the music which will be streamed on the radio. Using these data from several years, we represented the behaviours of the Sun Radio listeners.
Artificial Intelligence
Artificial Intelligence to organize school groups schedule
Small AI project in Prolog to organize school group schedule.
Software development
Satellites simulator (Google Hashcode)
Resolve Google HashCode challenge in team with C++. We had to simulate satellites around the Earth to take pictures with GPS coordinates.

Designed a Web Application to calculate business KPI of a start up. (2-month internship)
